text:
[504] Base 7  	(File: 504.base-7.py)

https://leetcode.com/problems/base-7

* Easy (44.63%)
* Total Accepted:    NaN
* Total Submissions: NaN
* Testcase Example:  '100'

Given an integer, return its base 7 string representation.

Example 1:

Input: 100
Output: "202"



Example 2:

Input: -7
Output: "-10"



Note:
The input will be in range of [-1e7, 1e7].
